message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs. We believe it could greatly enhance your operations and bring significant value to your business. Considering its worth to us and the benefits it offers, we are extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $1350000.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm not sure it's worth $1350000 to me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1050000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective and would like to present an alternative. Considering the value you place on the product, I propose a price of $1200000. This still reflects the high quality and unique features of the product while being more aligned with your valuation.
